website_summaries.verdict: Not for everyone, but a smart choice if you like the idea of being able to use them in the oven.
pros: can be used for storage and food prep in the microwave or oven
cons: Breakable, so must be handled with extra care
Heavier than plastic containers and bulky to store

website_summaries.verdict: Another larger set of storage containers perfect for cooking use.
pros: Includes 9 variously sized containers with 9 lids
cons: Stacking the containers can lead to glass cracking and breaking

customer_reviews.title: Don’t microwave these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these awhile ago, but will not buy them again. It says they are microwave safe but I wouldn’t recommend microwaving them. Mine shattered in the microwave today. So not only am I disappointed, I’m hungry! I didn’t want to eat my lunch in case there were glass slivers in my smothered burrito. I’m crabby from hunger as I leave this review. They should replace the ones that shatter like this but apparently you have to send in the broken one? Really? By the way, that’s not blood in the picture. It’s burrito sauce. :)
customer_reviews.author: Denise Schuetter

customer_reviews.title: How do I replace glass shattered in microwave?
customer_reviews.text: Glass shattered in the microwave on the first use. I tried to get a replacement, but am required to send back the original. I don't see how I can do that, the glass is shattered. I had another set that works great, but this one seems to be a specific item that is defective. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke with first use
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this set- I heated up soup in the microwave in one of the bowls the day after I received them in the mail. The glass broke in the microwave after one minute. Very unfortunate, never had that experience before. Back they went!
customer_reviews.author: M. Winter

customer_reviews.title: a bother to store when not in use, lids are difficult
customer_reviews.text: Cons: when it is not in use, it takes up way too much storage space. The glass bottoms don't really nest (except for the ones that are different sizes, but same shape), and the tops slide all over the place. Several of the tops also did not close well, one side would keep popping open. They are not easy to open/close - I never bring over food to my mother in these containers. Pros: Reheat without worry. They look great when in use. I have brought this to parties because it can go directly on the table (But, unlike the cheap plastic ones, you'll want to be sure to get it back)
customer_reviews.author: TheSageRosemary

customer_reviews.title: Lids and flap very difficult to snap shut
customer_reviews.text: While storage capacity and being leak proof are very important attributes for any storage container, I have a hard time locking the lids on any of these containers. It is extremely difficult to snap fit the lid even for moderately strong arms like mine. I almost always only am able to lock 3 out of the 4 flaps. Calling customer service did not help either. I wish more reviews had talked about this problem so that I could make a better educated purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas Vadlapatla

customer_reviews.title: We have two sets of these and use them for ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two sets of these and use them for everything. I reheat and cook in them all the time. I've never had one break. Three spots for improvement - 1) the shapes could nest together more efficiently. 2) the containers could be designed to use the same size/shape lid, making it less of a matching game 3) the seal could be easier to remove. I mostly wash them with the seal in place and sometimes get black mold growth. Removing the seal to sanitize them in those cases is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: MWA

customer_reviews.title: Love Glasslock - go with the all square set though
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Glasslock. Seriously I cannot get enough. Don't use the round ones. they take up a lot of room. Invest in the rectangle and square ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **DANGER**  Glass cracked and shards flew...
customer_reviews.text: The rim on one of the smaller glass pieces cracked and shards came loose (one is a couple inches long) on the very first use. The remaining edge and shards are very sharp and could definitely cause harm. This product is NOT safe! I'll be returning the entire set and, given the number of times I've seen this same issue reported in the reviews, I'm going to report this to the U.S. CONSUMER PRODUCT SAFETY COMMISSION for review.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Just don't drop them.
customer_reviews.text: These have been great to me. Keeps food secure, fresh, great for packing lunches or storing leftovers. Would also be great for preparing food in advanced. I never reheat directly inside of these. I've never had any problems with temperatures or damage due to temperatures (I do put hot things in them, and refrigerate them). One star lost because one got dropped maybe 2 feet on to ceramic tile and holy crap the explosion of glass shrapnel was crazy! We were still finding micro shards days later. Extremely dangerous with a kid and pets. On the other hand, it's my fault for dropping it so can I really blame the manufacturer for this?
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: The lid does not lock and the seal keeps coming loose
customer_reviews.text: They look nice. But they are awful from a functional perspective. First, the seal keeps coming loose. Which means you have to keep putting it back into the lid. And the lids will not lock. I tried everything outside of breaking it and no dice. In short, a total waste of money. Maybe mine was defective? Don't know. But I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: loved these but edges have broken
customer_reviews.text: these were the perfect Tupperware dishes but the rims have chipped over the past 3 months and now 3-4 of the container cant latch onto the lid bc the glass it chipped. One of them we had to throw away because it was dangerous. Such a shame because until they started chipping they were by far the best Tupperware dishes i have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chasedaroundtheworld

customer_reviews.title: Silicone gasket on lid develops mold after years
customer_reviews.text: I am updating this review after having this product since 2017. I really liked this product but after a few years, black mold developed under the lids on the silicone gaskets. While the company provides "free: replacement lids, the shipping is around $20 for 3 lids so to me this defeats the purpose of getting lids only when I could order an entire new set of containers for around the same price. The company suggests removing the gaskets and cleaning, however they are not easy to clean. I will not be getting this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Love this set of glass containers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of glass containers. I bought a set over a year ago and decided to expand by purchasing another unit. It's not cheap, but well worth the cost, especially if you're trying to move away from plastic containers. No issues with lids yet. No glass has been broken either (from prior year purchase or current year). They medium rectangular containers are the perfect size for meal prep (or leftovers that include a main and a side). I think this is the size that I use most often.
customer_reviews.author: maybreeze01

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but may shatter.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. The containers seem to be of good quality, and the lids fit on very securely (I had a very hard time when I first got them because they were so stiff). However, one of our medium sized containers shattered in the microwave when transferred from the fridge, and tempered glass isn't supposed to do that, especially since this stuff states all over it that it is microwave, stovetop, and broiler safe. I'm afraid to put any more in or on any kind of hot surface. So, not too impressed given the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product for people with little strength or little patience
customer_reviews.text: The locks are sometimes hard to actually lock into place. They seal quite well, but it can be frustrating and can hurt your hands when trying to get all four sides to lock. This is not a good product for people with little strength or little patience. I bought these because of the glass dish, as I prefer the durability of the glass. I will keep using these, but it will take a little time and patience to get used to the lids.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We want to store leftovers, etc. in glass rather than plastic. Very pleased with these. The lids go on easily. It make take a time or two to position the lid exactly right on the container sometimes. Not hard to snap. We also own other, cheaper brands. Now they can be a problem. Even though we've had this other brand for several years sometimes I have to slam down the catch hard--like an open handed slap. Not these.
customer_reviews.author: bgw3

customer_reviews.title: Both my wife and I agree this is the best food storage solution available
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of Glasslock Storage containers and we have now replaced all of our old plastic stuff. Both my wife and I agree this is the best food storage solution available. Leftovers go from the refrigerator to the microwave or oven and cleanup is quick and easy either by hand or in the dishwasher. I would recommend these to anyone, though the combination of younger kids and granite counter-tops may introduce a breakage issue. My only issue is that stacking them in the cabinets occasionally causes them to wedge together, but we have resolved this by placing a paper towel between them.
customer_reviews.author: James Tomberlin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: 1 - Directions on the Box give repeated Warnings: "DON'T to this! DON'T do that! "DON'T. DON'T. DON'T!" & "Keep this Box for future reference!" 2 - Heavy! The glass containers are solid but too Heavy for most people. 3 - Plastic Lids are TOUGH to remove! You must be Strong or you will be unable to unlock/remove the Lids! 4 - I have no "Blue" in my kitchen. Color choices are too limited. 5 - Two (2) or (3) of the Lid rubber moldings already fell off / out of their track. Immediately. Simply when unpacking the Box. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN ACCT

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning up the fridge
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during the coronavirus lockdown when I reorganized my entire home. I switched from plastic containers to glass. I had a few of these before but not in the right sizes. The options in this package are ideal. They nest inside each other in the cabinet but look neat in the fridge - helps keep it uncluttered. The only issue I had was that when they arrived, the rubber seal had come out in a few of them. It was easy to pop it back and the seals have stayed in place since then.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: Thank Goodness for Glass!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting with Rubber Maid and Tupperware products for years! no matter how careful you are they eventually stain, get all weird looking with white stuff if you forget and put it in the dishwasher. THIS IS THE GREAT SOLUTION!!!! The only problem is you must be careful when you are opening the containers because they REALLY lock tight! This is normally a good witch, but you may find yourself covered with whatever is in the dish, or the dish may go flying. Good news they DON'T BREAK! So make sure you open with the container flat on a counter or table. They clean up so nice and have a removable seal which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Seal well and look nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the new blue color and how tightly these seem to seal. I haven't checked them with water but the lid seems pretty darn sealed when I open it--I have to pry it off after popping off the tabs. Recently learned trick: if you are having a hard time closing a tab (like I was), try using the base of your hand to push down on the middle of the lid while closing the tabs. Edited a few days later: closing these can be a real pain in the behind. I could NOT get one to close yesterday despite every trick I could think of. Hopefully, they will wear in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 18-Piece Assorted Oven Safe Container Set]
customer_reviews.text: It seems some of the reviews for this brand of products are being applied to all of their products so I'm being specific here. THIS set arrived yesterday and the biggest bonus I found immediately is these nest inside one another WITH THE LID ON. Tell me THAT won't make putting leftovers away fast and easy! The lids seem to be in great shape, SNUG fitting and the silicone seal is easy enough to pinch with fingers and pull out for cleaning to avoid mold issues, slides right back in also. I found no imperfections in the glass or lids (some reported cracked products). I'm already hunting around in their products to replace my larger plastic storage items!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not all that.
customer_reviews.text: Two things bother me about this glassware. First, the class is heavy and bulky. I tried to use it to bring leftovers to work, but it's too heavy. Second, I feel the advertising re: the lids is deceptive. The lid has silicone, but is mostly plastic - which of course means it cannot be used in the oven, etc. I wouldn't even put it in the dishwasher, personally.
customer_reviews.author: Inkling

customer_reviews.title: The lids have room for improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The containers themselves have been fine for me. They're glass; they hold food. That's what I asked for. The lids, though, I have a couple issues with. They're a little hard to put on, especially on the bigger containers, but that's not a big deal. The real problem is that I keep getting mold between the rubber seal and the lid. I just take it out and clean it and let the two pieces dry completely before I put them back together, but I wish I'd bought a set with one-piece lids.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! WORTHLESS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these glass containers for a little over a week and already 3 are broken. Microwave for 30 seconds? Explode. Place on the counter from the cupboard to put food in it? Explode. Put a container in the fridge? Explode. These are very temperature sensitive I don't see how they are microwave or oven safe. Such a waste of money. Extremely disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be nice when you first take them out of the box then you remove the lid to wash them and then the lids do not go on so easily. It is hard to line them up exactly so the locks will click in place. Just too difficult. Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but has limits...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should be storing and heating in glass....don't we all know that by now?! I really like these and am reordering today. I've had several chip at edge however I have to assume some responsibility because I used to nestle in each other without thought to how it might be rubbing and I put in sink with silverware lying in them and across edge. I do not use in micro as I don't have one. Nor do I use in oven.
customer_reviews.author: misspiggy

customer_reviews.title: seals quickly turn brittle and break
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these can be used in the freezer because a few uses turns the seals brittle and then they form cracks. But don't worry, they will last at least 1 month so you can't return them anymore ;) Too bad I bought so many of these, thinking they were top quality.
customer_reviews.author: osidfa

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: We have a older set, purchased at COSTCO, that we always to seemed to run out of. Leftovers make great breakfasts and we never have enough Glasslock containers. This newer set, microwave, oven and dishwasher safe, are much thicker and sturdier that our original set. They are perfect for keeping those leftovers fresh and ready for the early morning munchers in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Chipping and breaking
customer_reviews.text: These are breaking and chipping EVERYWHERE. We have another set of glass lock containers and have never had an issue. But these are breaking to the point that glass is ending up in our other containers and I even found some in our food. Super unhappy. I want to return them but I no longer have the box...
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Neff

customer_reviews.title: Space saving solution
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using these for almost a year now. They are AMAZING! So easy to use, never any issues with chipping glass when stacked. These are perfect and will last a lifetime. Also free lid replacement from glasslock makes this killer when you have a most dog. (just pay for shipping)
customer_reviews.author: ezekiel3714

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! I had a cabinet full of old, plastic bowls that were stained. I wanted something that would not stain and I could still bring my lunches to work in. These are just that. Very high quality and wont stain. The lids make a great seal and the different sizes allow me to pack all kinds of different foods. Would recommend to anyone looking for storage bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lidss are not dishwasher safe. They become brittle and the tiny locking tabs break off.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lively

customer_reviews.title: No-leak storage, but cleanup is a pain
customer_reviews.text: I won't use anything but glass for my food storage, and the locking lids are awesome. They hold sideways, upside down, etc. The containers all arrived in good condition with no chips, and I haven't had any explode in the microwave as with other brands. It's annoying to have to remove the rubber sealing rings every time I wash a lid, but until there's a better product on the market, I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: You will love them too
customer_reviews.text: I have had these several months,I think I have bought about 8 sets now ,one for my maid,and nurse ,that takes care of my wife.I am going to try and buy stock in this company.You can freeze in them,, cook in them,,, microwave in them,,, and storing your food it will last, days and days .Open a bag of salad mix and it will be brown in two days,I put some in my container 3 days ago and it is as fresh as the day I put it in.I am very detailed perfectionist This is the best review I have written,,and well deserved,sorry I think I purchased 9 sets,as an inventor I missed this one!.Thank You.Roger Glass Esq.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M Glass

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable, functional, versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these only a week, and I don't know how I lived 70 yrs. without them -- they are indispensable!! I have used them in the oven, in the microwave, in the fridge -- and they function perfectly everywhere, every time,. The set has all the just right sizes for my leftovers, as well as meal prep items. They seal tightly, they wash & store easily. I can see what's in them. There are always at least four or five in my fridge at any given time. Thanks for a GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: The best click to close
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned several different brands of this type of storage container, and this one is easily the best. Easy to click, easy to clean. Lids are clear so that contents are easily identifiable. glass is very sturdy, I have yet to break one and they have survived falls from the counter. My only wish, is that they stacked a little better with a groove or a ridge to keep them from sliding off one another, but thats a tiny gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Thefrenchpig

customer_reviews.title: Surprised that I love these as much as I do.
customer_reviews.text: Actually love these. Toss them in the oven and they're fine. Toss them in the dishwasher and they're heavy enough not to get tossed around. Putting them back in the drawer takes a tiny bit of time if you bother to put one within another like Russian Nesting Dolls, the way they were shipped. But its kind of fun to do, so I don't actually mind it. Pretty silly when you just needed the smallest one and you have to open three of them, but again, the snapping action of the lids is rewarding, so it can actually be enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Will H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the glass containers - well made, but not too heavy. The lids are plastic, but sturdy and they snap securely onto the container, creating a very air-tight seal. Cupboard storage is simple and neat. When in use, it's easy to determine contents and quantity at a glance. They're offered in a variety of sizes/shapes, with differing lid colors. They look brand new each time they come out of the dishwasher - no waxy feel, no stains, no odors, no lids that have disappeared (I hate plastic). The only negative - someone with painful joint problems (fingers, wrists) may have trouble locking/unlocking the lids. If so, check them out in a store before buying on line.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Best Storage Containers
customer_reviews.text: These are the containers I have ever owned! They do not leak and they keep food fresh. They are easily cleaned as well. The glass is nice and sturdy as well as the lid! These are the only containers I will ever purchase in the future. I can't recommend these enough! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These are really great containers. They are spill proof and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really great containers. They are spill proof and easy to clean. The only downside is they weight more than regular containers and they're sometimes difficult to snap close, but overall I like them because the glass is thick and they won't break easily-they've fallen a few times into flat surfaces. They work great in the oven too and they are dishwasher and oven friendly. I don't wash the lids in the dishwasher because they are plastic, and I don't like to mix hot stuff and plastic, but its a durable type of plastic. I've had these since November of 2016. I would deginitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with these. I specifically bought them so I could cook food in my countertop oven which won't accommodate full sized casserole dishes. They work well, and the lids snap on very tight. I have not tried one in the freezer yet, but since the lids fit so tight I best they work great for freezing foods. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: icanhike

customer_reviews.title: I really like these containers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these containers. I have used them in the freezer, fridge, microwave, and oven without any issues. I accidentally left a lid on top of my toaster oven and it didn't melt! The lids and containers fit together well. I was able to remove the seal to do a deep clean without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: MFriedrich

customer_reviews.title: Lids are a little difficult to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when we switched from crappy plastic containers to glass and they were ok. I like the look of them but the kids were difficult to latch and cake off better than another brand that we ultimately went with. I returned these but I do think they were pretty good, just not as good as the Rubbermaid ones we found and love.
customer_reviews.author: KKL—L&L’s Little Shop of Goodies- Living Life RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY! But 18 means 9 tops and 9 bottoms -- not 18 different containers.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these containers! So easy to clean, makes life much easier... and I microwave these without a doubt in my mind... whereas I would be apprehensive about microwaving with plastic... One thing that I will say is that the description is 18 piece... and as you see in the picture that does not look like 18 different containers... so I was so surprised that you get 18 ... but then I received the package and its 9 containers (9 tops and 9 bottoms = 18 piece). So I was kind of disappointed by that because that seems a little strange but 9 containers is more than enough for me and great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Well made product. Hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.text: I am totally doing away with plastic containers so was happy to see this set. There is a nice variety of sizes and quality of the glass is very good. What I don’t like are the four sided snap lids. They are very difficult for me to snap and unsnap, and frequently can only get three sides closed which defeats the purpose of a sealed container. Disappointed because of that.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: These create glass shards in your food
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. Within a few uses, I found shards of glass in my food. At first, I thought it had come from something else until the second and third time... after investigating the entire glass Tupperware, I found that multiple containers were chipping and bits were coming off from the rims into my food. So scary! I immediately threw them all out. So basically money flushed down the toilet. I went back to plastic Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Good containers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a single Glasslock container I left behind during a move. They're great, and the glass seems to have a good temper. The snap-lock on these lids seems to be a bit harder to snap-on that my previous box, but that's ok. The variety of sizes makes this a very useful pack. The rectangular boxes are good sizes for bringing lunch to the office. The other containers in various sizes are useful for also storing meals or storing smaller things like sides or small bits of leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: green_tea

customer_reviews.title: Cook-store-reheat
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy duty glass containers. The lids lock tight. These have been great for cooking, storing and reheating. Its perfect for baking a few chicken breast in one and some vegetables in another. Then after they've cooled down snap on the lids and toss in the fridge. I can take leftovers to work for lunch and never dirty extra dishes. Plus I feel a lot better about using glass rather than plastic for reheating. Plastic you can microwaved but these can be microwaved or put in the oven/toaster oven. Great investment
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The glass part of the containers are fine. It does the job
customer_reviews.text: The glass part of the containers are fine. It does the job, and the variety of sizes and shapes are great. However, the plastic lid is really tight, and it takes a lot of effort to click it in. I almost feel like they are not the right fit. I had had other brand glass containers with better fitting/clicking plastic lids.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Was going through previous purchases and realised I've had these for over 3 and a half years. One of the circle ones dropped onto my tiled floor and shattered. Other than that, they have been perfect, easy to clean, still love the different sizes, about to get another set!
customer_reviews.author: Fruta Fresca

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later - still like new!  Great for Food Preps and storing leftovers from restaurants!
customer_reviews.text: Last time I purchased these was on "You purchased this item on July 17, 2016". Now, I am back to buy more. Almost 2 years later (used every day for the last 600+ days) they are still in LIKE NEW CONDITION. Food, Fridge, Lunch Box and Dishwasher - still work great. I came back for 2 reasons. 1 = to leave a review and 2 = to purchase another set since I don't want to have to wait to wash them :)
customer_reviews.author: Onafets

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for elderly people with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Lids are hard to open and impossible for me to close properly. I can get 3 sides, but not the 4th. Had a visitor my age, and she had the same problem. Also, they're heavy glass and one needs to be careful handling and storing them. Not going from fridge or freezer to microwave is a nuisance. Sorry I bought them. Will give them to my DIL if she's willing to take the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeps with Books

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and last forever.
customer_reviews.text: I usually cook for 2 meals, and always have left overs. These are by far superior to any other glass container, but they do cost more. I have a couple for several years and they are awesome. I do not put the lid in the dish washer because that can warp the plastic and the rubber ring. I just prefer to use glass and pay more now, than get the cheap plastic that you throw away every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Betta FishTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Glass shards hard to close
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a while but throwing the set out today they have always been insanely hard to close and I am a strong guy. We had some glass shards we found which seems to be from stacking them. Pour some hot water on one and it shattered. Too risky to keep using these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but the lids was not that good and all ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this purchase. I was brought one set from Costco. It’s good but the lids was not that good and all same shaped. But this lids tight and beautiful, different shapes containers and not too small pieces. Everything perfect. Looks great. I’m an idiot and analyzer of each and every review with every purchase. I’m so happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass is weird brown color, NOT CLEAR!
customer_reviews.text: The glass is NOT CLEAR for 4 of the 5 containers received. Instead it is sepia brown in color making the glass appear old and dirty. Makes me question their manufacturing and quality control because the strange color is quite obvious. Tried to contact Glasslock customer service. Number on the box doesn't work and the number on the website only allows you to leave a message. No reply. Also emailed. No reply.
customer_reviews.author: nearfabulous

customer_reviews.title: Glass + Gains = MASS
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty dope. Packaging is really easy to open, lids are totally chill. I put all my meals in here when I meal prep with all my sweet potatoes and chicken. You know what they say, glass gets the gains. Plus, dont have to worry about that weak plastic melting in the microwave. Take the lids off before you microwave though, don't want to mess the rubber seal up. Ill probably buy some more seeing as its been a week since I got these in the mail and my bench has increased 45 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: kevin b

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, no customer support
customer_reviews.text: In general, glasslock containers are fantastic. However, we received a second set that had two broken lids. We contacted the manufacturer and have heard nothing back. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: food stays fresh and you can see what's inside
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is glass. Very sturdy and easy to clean. Easily see what is inside so things don't get forgotten. The one thing that I didn't like is it is hard to open sometimes so an elderly person probably would not be able to handle these and they are heavy. Overall I love this set!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnnaWilliams

customer_reviews.title: ... are a few where the lids do not snap easily. I know it takes some elbow grease to ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because there are a few where the lids do not snap easily. I know it takes some elbow grease to make it snap, but this is to the point where I feel like I'm going to break the lid! Also I have one too many that looks like the folding part of the lid is going to snap off after a few uses... I'm worried but there is nothing else to do but wait... I hope if it snaps, it happens within the 30 days...
customer_reviews.author: R.Park

customer_reviews.title: These have worked well for me so far. The ...
customer_reviews.text: These have worked well for me so far. The lids fit tight, giving a complete seal; I did not have any trouble getting the lids to fit onto their container. I do not put the lids in the dishwasher at all, but I have done so with the bottoms. I have used in the microwave and in the fridge (back and forth) with no problems of chipping, cracking or breaking so far.
customer_reviews.author: Caeneus

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the box, there were shards of ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, there were shards of glass in a bowl! It does not matter what the cause may have been; this can't happen. This product should be removed from circulation before someone swallows some glass.
customer_reviews.author: Laffur Assov

customer_reviews.title: Essential Kit for you Kit-chen... Now...that was awkward
customer_reviews.text: Reasons why I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase, several months in: - I got what was advertised - The glass is quite durable, just don't drop it on solid concrete : ) - The plastic seems of a good quality - Perfectly preserves my daily meals. Cons: - The big round glass container isn't getting sealed very tight, at least for me. (but I'm still happy for my purchase)
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Pech

customer_reviews.title: Best glass containers ever
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other cheaper brands and more expensive and these ones last the longest and the lids fit the tightest. The bottom line really is that the lids fit perfectly and I am now brand loyal to Glass Lock for lidded glas containers
customer_reviews.author: Aliki Russo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We just started meal prepping and I didn’t like my plastic Tupperware. These have been so easy to use, good size for food but also space saving for storage and innthe fridge. We had a whole weeks worth of lunches and it was good even on Friday!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gowin

customer_reviews.title: Two of the plastic lids arrived damaged. They were ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of the plastic lids arrived damaged. They were split at the point they bend to snap down on the container. I returned the product. I did not even get to use it. The lids need to be redesigned since they are too thin at the point they bend 90 degrees. I noticed there are multiple sites to buy replacement lids, so this must be a common problem with Glasslock lids. I also ordered a set of POPIT! Glass containers and their lids are performing well. I will buy more POPIT! Glass containers instead.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Mold constantly grew around the silicone gasket in the lid, requiring me to remove the gasket each time I cleaned the lid. After doing this enough times, the gaskets became punctured (they are very difficult to remove, even with a butter knife). I contacted glasslock and they told me I could order new lids for free on their website. Great, I thought, until I discovered the shipping for a few plastic lids would be $25, so forget that. Terrible product, terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I love these though sometimes it feels like I have to force the lid tabs closed, even when top is all the way down. Still love the quality and have had no problems using them in the microwave, oven, or dishwasher. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. Love that it is made out of non-toxic glass. Wish we could find a way to make a non-toxic lid but it's alright. They seal food nicely. Only other minor complaint is that they are very loud when you try to close them. Not ideal while your roommate is asleep. I like the selection of sizes that comes with this set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my storage!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Replaced by old Pyrex with them. I love that they snap closed. They also store well in the freezer or refrigerator. I don’t microwave with the top on to prevent any damage. Cleans easily! I’ll definitely buy more, but just more of the exact size I use the most (which are the larger sizes).
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but could use at least one BIG size
customer_reviews.text: Good. 5 stars if it had at least one very large container in the collection. Lots of leftover pasta? Nope - have to use several small containers.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Zon Guru ManChild

customer_reviews.title: Glass broke, sliced my finger
customer_reviews.text: These are great storage containers, except for a dangerous flaw! Today I opened the lid of my lunch, felt a stinging sensation, and noticed my finger bleeding profusely. At first I couldn't even see the problem, but there was a tiny glass piece broken off where the lid attaches to the glass. It is extremely sharp and hard to see. I really cut myself! I wouldn't recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Faust5

customer_reviews.title: So far good set.
customer_reviews.text: The glasslock set arrived undamaged even though the packing box had a nice size dent in it. It seems to be really good quality and made of pretty thick glass. I Love the lids so far. They lock really tight so NOTHING comes out. I like that most of the containers are square, they fit better in my cabinet. The color of the lids are nice as well. I also like that these can be used in the oven as well, up to 450 degrees, so versatile. Over all I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: NytaTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: My second order of this brand. Got the first ones at Costco 5 years ago, they're still decent but have lid hinge wear (not unusable however.) Liked them so much that I bough this new pack. I think the quality has improved. This is a very nice set and I certainly recommend it. [I would suggest microwaving only the glass lower dish and leaving the lid outside the microwave. That's just me, but I did get a very long life (and still continuing) with my first set. I've had no problems dish washing these.]
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Love these glass containers.
customer_reviews.text: I've had one set for over a year now which work great and have lasted with no issue. I recently purchased another set because I love them so much. (Anything to avoid the chemicals in plastic.) Upon the second purchase, one of the lids were broken and the seller promptly sent me a replacement. I have a feeling the newer version of the lids may not be as sturdy as when they first came out. Either way, I've had one set for over a year and the second set for months now with no issues. You can place liquid in them, lock it, and turn it upside down with no liquid coming out. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye XT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Thick glass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Thick glass, airtight lids, exactly as described. Only problem is that the kids can be tricky to get on, I reccomend pushing down towards the table/counter on the tabs rather than in towards the container portion itself to get them to lock easier. If you purchase these, you will understand what I mean! Absolutely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to just buy 2 of the 3 cup containers for lunches at a big box store but they were $10 each so I figured spending double gets me 5 containers roughly the same size plus 4 “bonus” pieces. Most of them stack which is nice to minimize storage space. They are air tight which isn’t assured with cheap snap on all plastic containers. They need to do a better job giving capacities of the individual containers so here they are.
customer_reviews.author: R Jiro

customer_reviews.title: A Winning Product
customer_reviews.text: I've spent hours googling tupperware and storage containers only to end up with <4 star products that decay over time. Then I saw Glasslock. It had great reviews and I had to get it myself. I concur with the great reviews. I've had these for several months and they are outstanding food containers. The "snap" hasn't changed, the metal hasn't changed color warped. I swear by these containers.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase of the same thing - must be good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this brand of glassware. Very useful for freezing dinners etc. I prefer to use over plastic as who knows what chemicals are in plastic... BPA is only the tip of the iceberg IMHO. A good range of sizes, can freeze meals for 1 - 3 people in one container depending on which you choose. 4 stars because the lids (plastic, I know, but I only put the lid on when the food is cold already) do wear out over time - (admittedly a long time). Would be nice if you could just buy the lids... Would give 4.5 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Durable quality glass product since 2014
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set from 2014 and never a day that this set fail me. It's environmental friendly yet durable. None of glass has chipped or broken after many washes or in dishwasher. GlassLock is honestly the best and I'm planning to purchased more to replace all my previous plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized set of containers that make dishing out leftover very easy. The lids snap on well and the containers are easy to store in the fridge or cupboard. The glass does not stain, goes into the dishwasher, and make reheating a breeze. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for left overs
customer_reviews.text: Great for reheating left overs in the microwave without the plastic worry. Lids seals beautifully great for taking lunches to work. I am slowly replacing all my plastic with the glass storage containers. These are not pyrex like, however , there is a warning not to go directly from the cold to the oven. I have not had any trouble with them when reheating in microwave, however. Great sizes, the like shapes do nest to take up less space in cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.O.

customer_reviews.title: Really can go from fridge to iven
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest. Stop agonizing over the reviews. These are the ones you want. I tried most and they couldn't actually go from fridge to oven. These can and do.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tatjana C. Versaggi

customer_reviews.title: Lids break after some use
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says.... it is leakproof and works in the oven as well as the microwave. My only disappointment was that the lids have statef breaking from the sides. I was going to buy myself another one of the s as me sets but now i will have to look for another kind
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great! I prep food for the week for my girlfriend and I, these are working great. The locking tabs work well, I could leave these upside down in the fridge or lunch pail and I wouldn't have to worry about soup or something like that seeping through the seams. Additionally, there aren't too many edges on these, so cleanup is a breeze! This set was enough for us, so I don't think we will be purchasing more in the near future, but if we needed to, I would certainly go with these Glasslocks again!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Thomas

customer_reviews.title: One of the lids won't snap shut
customer_reviews.text: I like this set BUT one of the lids won't snap shut no matter what I do. I've had many people try to snap it shut and it won't. Maybe the lid is too small, I don't know, but it's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass shards found in food
customer_reviews.text: The sides of the glass bowls under the lip chip off when the cover is snapped on. When they are stored, the shards fall into the larger bowl underneath. DANGEROUS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cut the plastics from your life.
customer_reviews.text: If you're cutting plastics from your life, these are a great addition to your kitchen. They snap pretty great and I've trusted these to hold sauces in my messenger bag and no problems so far. They are very handsome and a great variety of sizes that make sense and compact down to fit within the 3 largest sizes. The only drawback is it gets a little difficult to find the lids when every bowl is a diffeernt size. Id rather have 5 that are the same for my OCD!
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color and Stackable Feature
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of glass versus plastic and it is so nice how these are stackable. The negative is that these lids are impossible to get on or off, and I'm strong as an ox. Even my husband has difficulty snapping them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi E.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. One lid didn't snap down on one ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. One lid didn't snap down on one side, but all others work great. Easy to clean and keeps leftovers and such really well. Gotta keep the rubber seals clean or they won't close properly. Work great in the microwave, but be sure to loosen the lids first.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Thick glass and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these often to store away left over food. They keep the food fresh since no air sips in. They are a bit heavy so keep that in mind. They are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these containers
customer_reviews.text: Love these containers. Bought them as I am getting rid of all my plastic containers. The lids click easily on and off and are a very tight seal. I recommend hand washing the lids, but the glass containers can go in the dishwasher. Overall very happy with the quality and the variety of sizes in this set.
customer_reviews.author: tccoen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth shiny glass of these containers. The various sizes are just right and the lids are very well made and fit snuggly. They are the best containers for food prep, serving food, and storing left-overs that I've ever found. I can't say enough about them and would order another set just because like them so much, but my needs are covered. I think they would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen G.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely solid, doesn't crack or shatter
customer_reviews.text: Use these all the time for the past 5 months or so. No problems with shattering or anything like that. Containers feel very nice and high quality. The tops can be difficult to snap on and off at times, but I've never had a problem with it.We had other containers with plastic lids that cracked, so I'd much rather take these containers over those.
customer_reviews.author: John Mark Mines

customer_reviews.title: Replacing all plastic storage with these
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I am quickly replacing all my outdated and smelly plastic storage containers with these. Thrilled that they are NOT made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Great! Great! Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best purchase ever. I went all out against plastic for the new year and purchased this set. It is awesome. The lids click on easily and do not leak. They can go in the oven and dishwasher. The rubber gasket can be removed for cleaning and fits right back into a channel in the lid. The photo here has some blue label across the lid which my products do not have. Lids and glass are all clear w/white gaskets. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Gandy

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much I'm purchasing another set when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much I'm purchasing another set when I move into my next apartment. The lids fit perfectly and they've lasted really well over the past few months of dishwashing them regularly. Plus, I love that these are glass so I'm not worried about leaching chemicals into my food. Can't believe the amount you get for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Glass shards
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these in July of 2014 and have been using ever since. Over past 6 weeks we have had the most unpleasant experience of pieces of glass in stored food. At this point, I would pay more for better safety and durability. Not fun to chew something and discover that the unexpected crunch is a piece of glass. Reading other reviews I guess we should consider ourselves lucky it took as long as it did for the glass pieces to appear. Go elsewhere for your glass containers.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: THE LIDS ARE IMPOSSIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I like the various sizes that are offered in this set. However, I find them difficult to use because it’s impossible to get the lids snapped on. I regret this purchase, and wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Glasslock 18-Piece Assorted Oven Safe Container Set
product_meta.description: Color:ClearGlasslock delivers the flexibility of using one container for the microwave, freezer, dishwasher, and oven. Odor-free, stain-proof, and airplus liquid tight, the easy latching lids bring more convenience in storing your food. Glasslock is made of silica, soda ash, limestone, and other natural components, making it eco-friendly and recyclable. It is BPA free and does not contain any harmful environmental hormones.
feature_bullets: Includes Rectangle 1 x 6.3 cup plus 2 x 3.5 cup plus 1 x 1.6 cup Square 1 x 3.3 cup plus 1 x 1.5 cup Round 1 x 3.1 cup plus 1 x 1.6 cup plus 1 x 0.7
Different sizes to meet your storage needs, 18 Pieces include 9 Containers and 9 Lids

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,923 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
